mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.userNo, b.boardTitle, b.content, b.countLikes, b.boardCount, b.deletedTime, b.writtenTime, b.isReported, b.myCourseNo, u.userNick, u.userExp FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.userNo = u.userNo where b.deletedTime is null order by b.writtenTime desc limit #{size} offset #{offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM board where deletedTime is null

SELECT b.boardNo, b.userNo, b.boardTitle, b.content, b.countLikes, b.deletedTime, b.writtenTime, b.isReported, b.myCourseNo, b.boardCount, u.userNick, u.userExp FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.userNo = u.userNo WHERE b.boardNo = #{boardNo}
SELECT imageAddress FROM boardImage WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set boardCount=boardCount+1 where boardNo=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.userNo, b.boardTitle, b.content, b.countLikes, b.boardCount, b.deletedTime, b.writtenTime, b.isReported, b.myCourseNo, u.userNick, u.userExp FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.userNo = u.userNo WHERE b.deletedTime IS NULL AND b.myCourseNo IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.countLikes DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.delete: DELETE b FROM boardImage b JOIN (SELECT boardImageNo FROM boardImage WHERE imageAddress = #{imageAddress}) sub ON b.boardImageNo = sub.boardImageNo;

mapper.delete: delete from boardLikesUser where boardNo = #{boardNo} and userNo = #{userNo} and likeCheck = 'likes'
